name: Strange world (itch)
description:
Find the the two items and solve the puzzle in this strange fantasy based game but watch out for the monster that roams within the mansion.

You wakeup and find yourself in a strange mansion,the first thought that you have is where you are and how ever will you get out of here.Then a low growl of a large animal echoes through the mansion making you nervous and afraid, can you find your way home to reality?,or will you be trapped forever within this dark,odd place?
